name: A Job is a Job
description:
You needed a job? Well now you have one! I hope your like it!

This game was created as a demo in The Something Jam! hosted by C&D Cardboard Games. I impulsively joined the Jam with 36 hours left before submission. All visual assets were hand drawn in MS Paint. All music was recorded by me, so if you record game play, you won't get copyright stricken.

There are many known bugs, as this is a bare bones demo, the biggest of which being that if you are too good at picking up trash, sometimes, you delete other things. that may work in your favor, but it's not supposed to happen.

I plan to do some more work on this without the pressure of the Jam submission.
